movies.title: Alpha Dog
movies.plot: Johnny Truelove likes to see himself as tough. He's the son of an underworld figure and a drug dealer. Johnny also likes to get tough when things don't go his way. When Jake Mazursky fails to pay up for Johnny, things get worse for the Mazursky family, as Johnny and his 'gang' kidnap Jake's 15 year old brother and holds him hostage. Problem now is what to do with 'stolen boy?'

events.title: Nicholas Markowitz, who Zack Mazursky is based on, is kidnapped
Nicholas Markowitz, who Zack Mazursky is based on, is murdered
the body of Nicholas Markowitz, who Zack Mazursky is based on, is found in a shallow grave
